title: TransPerfect Helsinki Open for Business
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/3/2015 @ 10:24 AM Companies mentioned in this article: TransPerfect 
NEW YORK -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- TransPerfect , the world’s largest privately held provider of language services and technology solutions, today announced that its newest location in Helsinki, Finland is open for business. 
Serving as the financial, political, educational, and cultural center of Finland, Helsinki ranks as one of Europe’s most wealthy capitals—contributing roughly one-third of the country’s total GDP. Approximately 70% of foreign companies operating in Finland, as well as 83 of the top 100 Finnish companies, have settled in the Helsinki region. Major international firms such as Takeda, White & Case, Ogilvy & Mather, and Grey Group maintain branches in Helsinki. 
“Our new Helsinki facility marks our fourth Nordic office, solidifying our commitment to expansion in the area,” said Brooke Christian, TransPerfect’s Executive Vice President and Chief Sales Officer. “We look forward to providing a local point of contact to new and existing clients in Finland and throughout the region.” 
The addition of this new office alongside existing hubs in Copenhagen, Oslo, Saint Petersburg, and Stockholm enables TransPerfect to provide a local point of contact for both current and new clients in the region, while also responding to increasing demand for integrated language services and technology solutions from the breadth of industries operating in the immediate area. TransPerfect’s Helsinki location will offer a full suite of global business solutions, including translation, website localization, mobile app and software localization, multicultural marketing, e-learning and training support, remote and in-person interpretation, legal support services, as well as the GlobalLink translation management system.
